definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

sentences.english: The taxi that towed us to the nearest town was just as bad.
sentences.chinese: 那辆拖着我们到最近市镇的的士同样破破烂烂。

sentences.english: No respectable citizen in town had anything to do with Mad Henry
sentences.chinese: 市镇里没有哪个正派人与其有任何来往。

sentences.english: Strong town of expanding the implementation of policy, the new town was accelerated.
sentences.chinese: 实施强镇扩权政策，新市镇建设加快推进。

sentences.english: Old Henry drove to Swinnerton, the neighboring town, and procured a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 老亨利驾车去邻近的市镇温斯纳顿请来一位医生。

sentences.english: Expenditure on preparation of the overall development plan of the new town.
sentences.chinese: 新市镇整体开发计画规划费用。

sentences.english: Liaodan Handbag Factory is situated in Xinshi Town, Baiyun District, Guangzhou, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 廖丹手袋厂坐落于广州市白云区新市镇。

sentences.english: The town-hall meeting showed evidence of the partisan divide in America.
sentences.chinese: 这次市镇大会表明了美国党派的分歧。

sentences.english: The full moon deluged the town with silvery light.
sentences.chinese: 一轮明月使整个市镇浸浴在银色的光海里。

sentences.english: An ancient tomb was discovered at Qunxing precinct in Zhangshi of Qujiang County.
sentences.chinese: 曲江樟市镇群星管理区发现一座古墓。

sentences.english: The troops forced an entrance into the town.
Tseung Kwan O is located in south-east of New Territories, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 将军澳新市镇位于香港新界东南。

sentences.english: Before opening the port, HanKow was already a prosperous town.
sentences.chinese: 开埠之前，汉口已是一个繁华的商业市镇。

sentences.english: As Morgan rightly observes, here is the prototype of the self-governing American township.
sentences.chinese: 摩尔根说得对，这是美洲市镇自治区的一种原型。

sentences.english: I used to live in a small town with trees all around.
sentences.chinese: 我用生活在一个小市镇周围所有与树木。

sentences.english: A traveler came to a small Middle Western town.
sentences.chinese: 有个旅行家来到中西部的一个小市镇。

sentences.english: Members of his family have sat for the town for over a century .
sentences.chinese: 一个多世纪以来，他的家庭成员一直是一市镇的议员。
